title: GAME MODES
description: Each game mode offers a unique experience of strategy, action. Dominate different combat styles and prove your worth.

confrontation.title: Confrontation
confrontation.description: Eliminate enemies to score points and stay at the top of the Ranking.

collapse.title: Collapse
collapse.description: Advance on the enemy objective to capture it and defend your own to prevent the opponent from doing the same.

domination.title: Domination
domination.description: Capture and maintain the objective zones on the map to accumulate points. Keep your Clan at the top of the Ranking.

free_fall.title: Free Fall
free_fall.description: Go alone or in Squad, search for equipment and be the last player or team alive in a safe zone that gradually decreases.
